refnamediv.refpurpose: FTP dir command; Virtuoso FTP client

refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: Virtuoso has FTP client functionality, that can be used inside Virtuoso/PL. This Virtuoso function mimics the FTP dir command. As with any PL, this can be combined with Web Services and SOAP.

refsect2.title: server
refsect2.para: The remote server address or IP Address.

refsect2.title: user
refsect2.para: The username for authentication at the FTP server.

refsect2.title: pass
refsect2.para: The accompanying password for authentication at the FTP server.

refsect2.title: remote_dir_name
refsect2.para: The full path of the remote directory to list the contents of.

refsect2.title: is_pasv
refsect2.para: Flag to specify whether to use passive mode. This can be one "1" for passive mode, or zero "0" for active mode. One "1" is assumed by default.

refsect1.title: Return Types
refsect1.para: This function returns a vector of descriptions from the result of performing the dir command on the remote server. If errors occur then these will be returned instead.

refsect1.title: Errors
refsect1.para: This function will return any errors returned by the remote FTP server.
